attributes.action: do away with human rights for all child killers, abusers and paedophiles. to create sentences with no parole
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: we would like to see such offenders serve their FULL sentence with no chance of parole and to abide by any recomendations made for treatment and therepys.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
